bcbf4a4a-97d2-4bac-88d5-610e35295759.name: Battlesense
bcbf4a4a-97d2-4bac-88d5-610e35295759.notes: When Active: +1 to active defense rolls against sentient foes; 1 FP/min

e8209f10-ec0b-4b07-a1b2-8b49ef2235b0.name: Battlesense
e8209f10-ec0b-4b07-a1b2-8b49ef2235b0.notes: When Active: +2 to active defense rolls against sentient foes; 1 FP/min

1b07e3d5-3add-46cc-97ba-79196c752cd1.name: Battlesense
1b07e3d5-3add-46cc-97ba-79196c752cd1.notes: When Active: +3 to active defense rolls against sentient foes; 1 FP/min

91e7f55c-d25c-492d-958d-34d3692ae89d.name: 共情
91e7f55c-d25c-492d-958d-34d3692ae89d.notes: Acts as Empathy (Accessibility, Not on Elder Things); 1 FP/use

7abb95b9-89de-45c6-b3f3-aadd15f10c21.name: 悬浮
7abb95b9-89de-45c6-b3f3-aadd15f10c21.notes: Flight: Move 1, within 5' of horizontal surface

e4cd9a6b-c52e-4927-bb52-2fc1f22d13c6.name: 悬浮
e4cd9a6b-c52e-4927-bb52-2fc1f22d13c6.notes: Flight: Basic Move, within 10' of horizontal surface

b9cbb0f2-1683-414a-8ee3-6eb9b0b1085c.name: 悬浮
b9cbb0f2-1683-414a-8ee3-6eb9b0b1085c.notes: Flight: 2xBasic Move, within 10' of horizontal surface

129bd788-aad9-4ac1-b397-0f3527e63cc3.name: 25 Points chosen from the above or:

2b68b555-d856-44cb-93d0-5c3693d5cf4d.name: 特化
2b68b555-d856-44cb-93d0-5c3693d5cf4d.notes: @一 纲生物（如“哺乳类”或“鸟类”）@

d4e09a7c-d24f-4845-b7bd-ec0f82dd3945.name: 特化
d4e09a7c-d24f-4845-b7bd-ec0f82dd3945.notes: @一科生物（如“猫科动物”或“鹦鹉科动物”）@

0261a785-47d6-49b9-9580-64909aa73d61.name: 特化
0261a785-47d6-49b9-9580-64909aa73d61.notes: @一种生物（如“家猫”或“金刚鹦鹉”）@

features.situation: 来自主动交流（对话，演说等等）的智慧生物

17a00304-4f8c-456e-9ad3-93b38040d9df.name: 幸运
17a00304-4f8c-456e-9ad3-93b38040d9df.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

cca0b656-7dad-4f25-9622-ff0ac990ce6c.name: 魔法抗性 Magic Resistance
cca0b656-7dad-4f25-9622-ff0ac990ce6c.notes: -1/level to skill for others to cast a spell on you. +1/level to resist spells.

0aa788a7-75ad-4e84-bed2-05b517efa920.name: Resistance to Psionics
0aa788a7-75ad-4e84-bed2-05b517efa920.notes: -1/level to skill for others to use psionics on you. +1/level to resist psionic abilities.

d1e23d72-123b-424d-a209-a7aca55f293e.name: 标志性装备
d1e23d72-123b-424d-a209-a7aca55f293e.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

features.situation: 来自大骗子、政治家、商人，等等。——但仅限于你没有尝试去操纵他们的人。

9524bb39-2304-4058-9c6b-419cc8529a61.name: 特化
9524bb39-2304-4058-9c6b-419cc8529a61.notes: @类型：天使，恶魔，精灵， 鬼魂等@

58236775-dbfc-42ca-aa27-b0cb2aedd87b.name: 无所惊扰
58236775-dbfc-42ca-aa27-b0cb2aedd87b.notes: 你不用投恐惧检定，反应修正值对于你来说也几乎无效。

features.situation: 来自任何能听到你声音的人

2776c8ae-abd9-42c3-9616-707f82e5c5d5.name: 好奇
2776c8ae-abd9-42c3-9616-707f82e5c5d5.notes: 在遇到有趣的物品或情况时进行一个自控检定

d1bab218-b99f-440f-b269-94ffa92b603b.name: 战斗麻木
d1bab218-b99f-440f-b269-94ffa92b603b.notes: 在你的人身安全受到紧急威胁时，做 HT 检定。你可以不检定，直到你需要打、跑、扣动扳机或别的什么行动。检定结果超过 13 就必定失败，即使你有 14 的 HT。如果成功，你可以正常行动，如果失败， 你陷入心理震慑。

features.situation: 对于你嫉妒的对象（最高 -4，GM 决定）

2849aacb-120e-42b9-b0b4-385988035187.name: 需要独处
2849aacb-120e-42b9-b0b4-385988035187.notes: 当有人在旁边晃来晃去、站在你身后俯视你等事情发生时，你需要进行自控检定。如果你失败，你会对那个人发脾气，如同你具有坏脾气劣势。

c90dd3fa-73f8-431c-81c3-009702594c7c.name: 低痛阈
c90dd3fa-73f8-431c-81c3-009702594c7c.notes: Double the shock from any injury. You roll at -4 to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.

features.situation: 来自当无幽默感劣势显而易见的情况下的其他人

afcc0aaf-5729-4586-98c5-7e50243c2014.name: 自负
afcc0aaf-5729-4586-98c5-7e50243c2014.notes: 如果 GM 认为人物过于谨慎，可能要求人物进行自我控制检定，如果检定失败，人物不再畏缩不前，就像你能解决问题一样！

features.situation: 来自年青幼稚的人，他们相信你的吹牛
对于任何“合理的”反应减值（例如，对于不友好的种族或国籍的人）翻倍

a9eacf8f-e534-4b8d-b8ab-c5862fe3ca31.name: 阵后战栗
a9eacf8f-e534-4b8d-b8ab-c5862fe3ca31.notes: 每次战斗结束时投自控骰。自控检定失败后，记录失败度，投 3d+ 自控检定失败度，查恐惧检定表得出结果。

1af48c55-7f10-4251-b469-06100f1c9ddf.name: 纵火狂
1af48c55-7f10-4251-b469-06100f1c9ddf.notes: 每当你有机会放火的时候，进行自控检定

4f7f4905-7dac-4adc-84b1-a24cb8e6bbd4.name: 自我中心
4f7f4905-7dac-4adc-84b1-a24cb8e6bbd4.notes: 当你被明显看轻或是被故意冷落的时候，进行一次自控检定。如果失败，你对着侮辱你的一方大发脾气，如同你具有坏脾气劣势。

features.situation: 来自当你表现出自我中心时的其他人

ab18318b-676c-4017-8c05-f91121a407d2.name: 不健康
ab18318b-676c-4017-8c05-f91121a407d2.notes: -1 to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc. As well, you lose FP at twice the normal rate.

732853da-a5b9-4035-86f8-a6163844f9ea.name: 比较贫穷
732853da-a5b9-4035-86f8-a6163844f9ea.notes: 起始财富为其社会平均水 平的 1/2

e7ae1a2b-cbf5-4d93-9e11-38a8e4218692.name: 贫穷
e7ae1a2b-cbf5-4d93-9e11-38a8e4218692.notes: 起始财富是其社会平均水平的 1/5

7b816620-2ea1-471b-ad03-104bf3f4bb19.name: -25 Points chosen from the above or:

5c1fde69-28da-4596-be3b-215ef904c61f.name: 范围：任何与你不同的人

features.situation: 来自感受到你的歧视的对象（最高到 -5，GM 决定）

82807326-7e58-4a61-bbe1-7ad93e543f6b.name: 执念
82807326-7e58-4a61-bbe1-7ad93e543f6b.notes: Become a world-class psi at any cost; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

67583caa-7904-4dbf-81d8-a6a388f55eab.name: 执念
67583caa-7904-4dbf-81d8-a6a388f55eab.notes: Learn something dangerous involving Elder Things; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

1002df74-e2e8-41de-9494-6ea6cab1456e.name: Choose 2, or raise Melee Weapon Skill by 1:

bb46bf69-5fe0-47ad-bb9a-b7ecebf4b796.name: Choose 7 or 1 point to buy anything from the above category:

ee67a450-602c-4163-a2bd-46bf40de4afa.name: Choose 4, or 2 points to raise one of those skills by a level
